text: "Revolution Radio" is a song by American rock band Green Day. It was released on May 16, 2017, as the third and final single from their twelfth studio album of the same name. The song's music video was released on June 12, 2017. ==Chart performance== "Revolution Radio" appeared on the charts back in 2016 after the release of the lyric video, charting at number 22 on the US Hot Rock Songs, number 6 on the UK Rock chart and number 71 in Scotland.
